1168700.name: Fantasy Grounds - Jans Token Pack 9 - Townsfolk Tavern (Token Pack)
1168700.description:
Jans Token Pack 9 - Townsfolk Tavern

Every great fantasy adventure has a
Tavern or an Inn
. Think of '
The Prancing Pony
' from Lord of the Rings, '
The Leaky Cauldron
' from Harry Potter, or '
The Inn of the Last Home
' from Dragonlance.
These are places where the adventurers can
relax
,
find rumors
, and
enjoy themselves
. These provide
great role playing opportunities
.

This token pack contains:
  • 20 Unique tokens
  • 40 Color variants
  • 3x Cooks (Orc, Halfling, Human)
  • 2x Bartender (Human, Dwarf)
  • 2x Doorman/Bouncer (Orc, Human)
  • 3x Waiter (Halfling, Human, Elf)

    10x Patron/Customer (Human, Dwarf, Orc, Elf, Halfling)[/list]
    Grab a chair, and warm yourself by the hearth fire. Meet interesting characters such as a Drow Elf waiter, have a cup of tea with a noblewoman, drink mead with a Dwarf, or have a beer with a Halfling.
    Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
    Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
    Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
